name: Techsmith
description: Mechanists who focus on pushing the boundaries of technological innovation, creating increasingly advanced and efficient machines that represent the pinnacle of engineering excellence.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical and mental energy that powers invention and device operation
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when operating or optimizing advanced technology
mechanics: Energy points are spent to operate devices and power advanced constructs
Some constructs require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to construct effectiveness and operation
Can be temporarily boosted through inspiration in critical situations
Successful technological innovation or optimization restores a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Scrap
resource_systems.description: Raw materials and components that can be salvaged and repurposed for inventions
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when salvaging items or collecting materials, decreases when crafting
mechanics: Increases by 20 when salvaging mechanical items or technological components
Increases by 25 when discovering rare or advanced materials
Decreases when crafting advanced constructs or inventions based on complexity
Decreases by 15 per hour when maintaining multiple active advanced constructs
Can be spent to create temporary advanced devices or upgrade existing inventions
Higher Scrap quality increases technological effectiveness and innovation potential

resource_systems.name: Automation
resource_systems.description: Measure of your ability to create and control automated systems
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully operating or improving automated advanced systems
mechanics: Increases by 15 when constructs successfully complete complex tasks
Increases by 20 when improving or optimizing automated systems beyond current limits
Decreases by 15 when advanced constructs malfunction or fail assigned tasks
Decreases by 20 when experimental automated systems are damaged or destroyed
Can be spent to enhance construct performance or execute complex technological sequences
Higher Automation increases the intelligence and independence of advanced constructs

resource_systems.name: Innovation
resource_systems.description: Measure of creative insight and technological breakthrough potential
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully developing new technologies or optimizing existing ones
mechanics: Increases by 15 when developing entirely new technological solutions
Increases by 10 when significantly improving existing technologies
Decreases by 15 when technological experiments fail catastrophically
Decreases by 10 when forced to use conventional solutions instead of innovations
Can be spent to push technological limits or achieve breakthrough moments
At maximum Innovation, enter a state of perfect technological insight

class_mechanics.name: Technological Mastery
class_mechanics.description: Unparalleled understanding of technological principles and applications
effects: Can understand and operate any technological device encountered
Able to identify optimal improvements for any technological system
Can reverse-engineer advanced technology with minimal examination
Presence enhances the performance of all nearby technology
Can predict technological behavior and limitations with perfect accuracy

class_mechanics.name: Efficiency Perfection
class_mechanics.description: Ability to optimize systems to their theoretical maximum performance
effects: Can identify and eliminate inefficiencies in any technological system
Able to reduce resource consumption while increasing output
Can optimize multiple interacting systems for synergistic effects
Presence naturally improves the efficiency of nearby technology
Can push systems beyond normal operational parameters without damage

class_mechanics.name: Breakthrough Design
class_mechanics.description: Ability to create revolutionary technological innovations
effects: Can develop entirely new technological principles and applications
Able to combine disparate technologies in unprecedented ways
Can solve seemingly impossible technical challenges through innovation
Presence stimulates creative thinking and technological insight
Can visualize and implement complex technological systems with perfect clarity

class_mechanics.name: Technological Pragmatism
class_mechanics.description: Practical approach to technology focused on results and advancement
effects: Can objectively evaluate technologies without emotional or ethical bias
Able to determine the most efficient path to technological advancement
Can adapt technological approach based on available resources and constraints
Presence encourages rational, results-oriented technological development
Can balance innovation with practicality for optimal technological progress

signature_abilities.name: Technological Singularity
signature_abilities.description: Achieve a state of perfect technological insight and innovation
mechanics: For 5 minutes, enter a state of unprecedented technological clarity
All technological devices and constructs operate at maximum theoretical efficiency
Can instantly understand, operate, and improve any technology encountered
Can create temporary technological solutions to almost any problem
Each successful technological application extends the duration by 10 seconds
Costs 100 Energy, 50 Automation, and 75 Innovation

signature_abilities.name: Advanced Construct Array
signature_abilities.description: Deploy a network of specialized constructs that work together with perfect coordination
mechanics: Create and deploy up to 7 advanced constructs with specialized functions
Constructs operate with perfect coordination and efficiency
Each construct can be assigned different tasks or combined for complex operations
System lasts for 10 minutes or until constructs are destroyed
Constructs can be reconfigured during operation to adapt to changing needs
Costs 75 Energy, 30 Scrap, and 50 Innovation

signature_abilities.name: Technological Transcendence
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily merge with your technological creations for unprecedented control and capability
mechanics: For 3 minutes, establish a perfect neural link with all your technological creations
Can perceive through all constructs simultaneously with perfect clarity
Control all constructs as natural extensions of your own body
Dramatically enhance the capabilities and efficiency of all linked technology
Can rapidly reconfigure and adapt technology to meet changing situations
Costs 50 Energy, 100 Innovation, and 25 Automation

skill_trees.name: Path of Innovation
key_abilities: Technological Revolution: Develop entirely new technological paradigms
Inspired Design: Create solutions that transcend current technological limitations
Adaptive Technology: Develop systems that evolve and improve automatically

skill_trees.name: Path of Optimization
key_abilities: Perfect Efficiency: Optimize systems to operate at theoretical maximum performance
Resource Minimization: Dramatically reduce resource requirements for technological operation
Synergistic Systems: Create technologies that enhance each other when operating together

skill_trees.name: Path of Integration
key_abilities: Unified Field: Create a network of perfectly integrated technological systems
Technological Ecosystem: Develop self-sustaining technological environments
Seamless Interface: Perfect the connection between operator and technology

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Systems Engineer skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Neutral alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Create a technological innovation that transcends current limitations
Optimize a complex system to its theoretical maximum efficiency

legendary_items.name: Innovator's Lens
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Can analyze any technology to identify optimal improvements
Provides perfect visualization of complex technological systems

legendary_items.name: Efficiency Core
effects: All technological devices operate at 30% increased efficiency
Resource consumption of all constructs reduced by 40%
Can temporarily overclock any technological device without damage

legendary_items.name: Integration Matrix
effects: Innovation maximum increased by 50
Can establish perfect neural links with technological constructs
Technological Transcendence cooldown reduced by 2 days

lore: Techsmiths represent the pinnacle of technological innovation among Mechanists, having dedicated themselves to pushing the boundaries of what's possible through engineering excellence and revolutionary design. These brilliant innovators have transcended conventional technological limitations to develop systems and constructs of unprecedented sophistication and efficiency, constantly striving to perfect their creations and discover new technological frontiers. The path to becoming a Techsmith requires not only exceptional technical knowledge and mechanical aptitude but also a relentless drive for improvement and a mind capable of envisioning possibilities beyond current paradigms. Those who succeed find themselves capable of creating technological marvels that others would consider impossible or magical, solving complex problems through innovations that fundamentally change what technology can accomplish. Techsmiths typically operate as independent researchers or as part of advanced technological institutes, where they can focus on pushing boundaries without the constraints of immediate practical applications. Many establish specialized workshops filled with experimental devices and prototypes, constantly iterating and improving their designs in pursuit of technological perfection. Some even create technological enclaves where like-minded innovators can collaborate on breakthrough projects that might take decades to fully realize. Their combination of theoretical insight, practical engineering skill, and innovative thinking makes them unparalleled problem-solvers, capable of developing technological solutions to challenges that would stymie conventional approaches. Though they may lack the moral certainty of Artificers or the destructive focus of Warmachines, the technological brilliance and adaptive innovation of Techsmiths make them perhaps the most versatile and forward-thinking of all technological specialists.
